reviewText: The documentary, Highways to God: Taoism, which is hosted by Abbot Tao Huang, is a basic guide to the Taoist religion. As in all of the Highways to God series, the documentary is structured like an interview, where a question is asked and then the religious leader in question, in this case, Abbot Huang, gives his answer to that particular question. This documentary is a great guide to the basics of the Taoist religion.
